text: Tapā'ī bhanidinus ki hē mānisaharū timrō pālanakartābāṭa timrō chē'umā satya ā'isakēkō cha, tasartha jō mārgadarśana prāpta garna cāhancha, usalē pathapradarśanabāṭa āphnai nimti bhalō gardacha ra jasalē mārgavicalanakō bāṭō apanā'um̐cha usalē pathavicalanabāṭa āphnai nōksānī gardacha ra ma timrō hākima hō'ina
